snippet: Fire poi dancing has grown increasingly popular in America owing to its prominence at the annual Burning Man festival in Nevada. In New York poi dancers have found creative ways for such theatrics.
abstract: Fire poi dancing has grown increasingly popular in the United States due to its prominence at the annual Burning Man festival in Nevada; in New York it is usually done in secret because of fire code restrictions.
lead_paragraph: Fire poi dancing has grown increasingly popular in America owing to its prominence at the annual Burning Man festival in Nevada. In New York poi dancers have found creative ways for such theatrics.

headline.seo: Fire Poi Dancing on a New York Rooftop
headline.main: Up on the Roof, Dancing With Fire
headline.print_headline: Up on the Roof, Dancing With Fire
